Felly, mae'r cariff,
y cariff icon, was made,
there was three feathers
and the two dragons either side
that represented Wales.
And on the top
was CIEC, Cariff International Athletic Club,
then there was the black and white chicken hands,
it's a mixed club, all the national teams play,
and it's a black and white chicken hands,
then there was two worlds,
and that was the two worlds we live in,
and underneath it was unicef datum,
meaning one hand the same.
